description: SQL injection vulnerability in the page-navigation implementation in Cybozu Garoon 2.0.0 through 2.0.6, 2.1.0 through 2.1.3, 2.5.0 through 2.5.4, 3.0.0 through 3.0.3, 3.5.0 through 3.5.5, and 3.7.x before 3.7.3 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-6929.
